outputs.output_descr: Output 1: The NCSA Project aims to assess the national capacity of Samoa to address the Conventions on Biological Diversity, Climate Change and Land Degradation through the NCSA process and will produce key reports namely, Inception Report, Stocktake Report, Thematic Assessment Report, Cross Cutting and Prioritization Report and the NCSA Action Plan.

project_title: PIMS 2551 NC : Samoa NCSA Phase II
